subject: Baseball
Television
lead_paragraph: It will be a challenge for Bud Selig to step out of the muck of bad publicity surrounding the deal to move the Extra Innings package of out-of-market games exclusively to DirecTV.
snippet: It will be a challenge for Bud Selig to step out of the muck of bad publicity surrounding the deal to move the Extra Innings package of out-of-market games exclusively to DirecTV.
